Text: Re st priority pleaseNBPL Response Cc Border Pipeline Companys box see above should read as follows Northern Border Pipeline Company NOT Northern Border LP Miles Bcfd Design Capacity Operated by Northern Plains Natural Gas Company Project will connect to a third Chicagoarea LDC Eliminate the bullet that says Chicago Project expanded system by of All Canadian Gas Exported to the US Please call me at if you have any further questions Martha SumnerKenney From Maria Salazar PM To Gina nron Jo WilliamsET NRON Robert L JohnsonET nron Beth NRON Larry nron Jeffery FawcettET NRON Perry FrazierET NRON Terry GalassiniET nron Lorraine LindbergET NRON Ronald MatthewsET nron Frank nron Kim NRON Michele WinckowskiET nron Bob M NRON Roger WestfallETSEnronMichael CT Daren J CT Sharon NRON Kevin HyattET nron Scott NRON Richard NRON Beth NRON Martha Sumner NRON Will nron cc Subject st priority please Jo Williams has asked me to help her update this map to provide Enron Corp IT so they may add a point and click map on the inter net I have contacted some of you by phone to update the attached map I am asking all of you to please carefully review this entire map title legend numbers spelling all of it Please reply whether you have changes or not about the information that appears on it GIVE ME AN APPROVAL OR DECLINE IT I realize this is short notice but we would need this at least by PM today Wed may th Jo is trying to place this in the hands of Will Zamer today Keep in mind that this map will probably be revised from some of your comments so it is NOT a map that should be distributed from any of you in fact you can delete it after youve provided us the help I will resubmit the final map upon its completion Thankyou all All your time is greatly appreciated regards Maria Salazar please call me if you would like
